data.name: AwaitXInstead
data.comment: "await" is a C# keyword and should not be translated. {0} is a method name.

data.name: UseAwaitInstead
data.comment: "await" is a C# keyword and should not be translated.

data.name: VSTHRD002_MessageFormat
data.value: Synchronously waiting on tasks or awaiters may cause deadlocks. Use await or JoinableTaskFactory.Run instead.
data.comment: "await" is a C# keyword and should not be translated.

data.name: VSTHRD010_MessageFormat_Sync
data.value: Accessing "{0}" should only be done on the main thread. Call {1}() first.
data.comment: {0} is a type or member name and {1} is the name of a method that throws if not called from the main thread.

data.name: VSTHRD010_Title
data.value: Invoke single-threaded types on Main thread

data.name: VSTHRD100_CodeFix_Title
data.comment: Task is a type name and should not be translated.

data.name: VSTHRD100_MessageFormat
data.value: Avoid "async void" methods, because any exceptions not handled by the method will crash the process.
data.comment: "async void" is a pair of C# keywords. Do not translate them.

data.name: VSTHRD100_Title
data.comment: "async void" is a pair of C# keywords. Do not translate them.

data.name: VSTHRD101_MessageFormat
data.value: Avoid using async lambda for a void returning delegate type, because any exceptions not handled by the delegate will crash the process.
data.comment: "void" is a C# keyword and should not be translated.

data.name: VSTHRD106_MessageFormat
data.value: AsyncEventHandler delegates should be invoked via the extension method "TplExtensions.InvokeAsync()" defined in Microsoft.VisualStudio.Threading assembly.

data.name: VSTHRD106_Title
data.value: Use InvokeAsync to raise async events

data.name: VSTHRD003_MessageFormat
data.value: Calling await on a Task when the task is initialized in another context can cause potential deadlocks. You can avoid this problem by ensuring the task is initialized within the same method or by using JoinableTask instead of Task.

data.name: VSTHRD011b_MessageFormat
data.value: Invoking or blocking on async code in a Lazy<T> value factory can deadlock. Use AsyncLazy<T> instead.

data.name: VSTHRD011_MessageFormat
data.value: Lazy<Task<T>>.Value can deadlock. Use AsyncLazy<T> instead.

data.name: VSTHRD103_Title
data.value: Call async methods when in an async method

data.name: VSTHRD102_MessageFormat
data.value: Limit use of synchronously blocking method calls such as JoinableTaskFactory.Run or Task.Result to public entrypoint members where you must be synchronous. Using it for internal members can needlessly add synchronous frames between asynchronous frames, leading to threadpool exhaustion.

data.name: VSTHRD200_CodeFix_Title
data.comment: {0} is a method name.

data.name: VSTHRD200_AddAsync_MessageFormat
data.value: Use "Async" suffix in names of methods that return an awaitable type.

data.name: VSTHRD105_MessageFormat
data.value: Avoid method overloads that assume TaskScheduler.Current. Use an overload that accepts a TaskScheduler and specify TaskScheduler.Default (or any other) explicitly.

data.name: VSTHRD105_Title
data.value: Avoid method overloads that assume TaskScheduler.Current

data.name: VSTHRD012_MessageFormat
data.value: Provide an instance of JoinableTaskFactory in this call (or another overload) to avoid deadlocks with the main thread.

data.name: VSTHRD104_MessageFormat
data.value: Expose an async version of this method that does not synchronously block. Then simplify this method to call that async method within a JoinableTaskFactory.Run delegate.

data.name: VSTHRD001_MessageFormat
data.value: Await JoinableTaskFactory.SwitchToMainThreadAsync() to switch to the UI thread instead of APIs that can deadlock or require specifying a priority.

data.name: VSTHRD001_Title
data.comment: thread switching APIs refers to Visual Studio SDK or .NET methods that can be used to switch threads, but are obsolete and should be avoided.

data.name: VSTHRD107_MessageFormat
data.comment: "await" and "using" are C# keywords and should not be translated.

data.name: VSTHRD107_Title
data.comment: "await Task" is a C# compound term, and "using" is a C# keyword. These should not be translated.

data.name: VSTHRD107_CodeFix_Title
data.comment: "await" and "using" are C# keywords and should not be translated.

data.name: VSTHRD002_CodeFix_Await_Title
data.comment: "await" is a C# keyword and should not be translated.

data.name: VSTHRD108_MessageFormat
data.value: Thread affinity checks should be unconditional.

data.name: VSTHRD010_MessageFormat_Async
data.value: Accessing "{0}" should only be done on the main thread. Await JoinableTaskFactory.SwitchToMainThreadAsync() first.
data.comment: {0} is a type or member name.

data.name: VSTHRD109_MessageFormat
data.value: Avoid throwing when not on the main thread while in an async or Task-returning method. Switch to the thread required instead.

data.name: VSTHRD109_Title
data.value: Switch instead of assert in async methods

data.name: VSTHRD004_Title
data.comment: Do not translate either of these. The first is a keyword, the second is a method name.

data.name: VSTHRD110_MessageFormat
data.value: Observe the awaitable result of this method call by awaiting it, assigning to a variable, or passing it to another method.

data.name: VSTHRD200_RemoveAsync_MessageFormat
data.value: Avoid "Async" suffix in names of methods that do not return an awaitable type.

data.name: VSTHRD111_CodeFix_False_Title
data.comment: ".ConfigureAwait(false)" should not be translated.

data.name: VSTHRD111_CodeFix_True_Title
data.comment: ".ConfigureAwait(true)" should not be translated.

data.name: VSTHRD111_MessageFormat
data.comment: ".ConfigureAwait(bool)" and "await" should NOT be translated.

data.name: VSTHRD111_Title
data.comment: "ConfigureAwait(bool)" is a reference and should NOT be translated.
